title: Vegan PhỞ Noodle Salad
shortDescription: Thanks to this recipe from Real Food Really Fast, we’re savoring the tempting flavors of Vietnamese phở without slaving over a hot stove.
fullDescription: Thanks to this recipe from Real Food Really Fast, we’re savoring the tempting flavors of Vietnamese phở without slaving over a hot stove.

instructionGroups.label: For the roasted potatoes
instructions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Rinse the potatoes, pat dry, and cut into 1/2 inch cubes. Place in a bowl, coat with oil, and toss. Spread evenly on a baking sheet  and bake for 30 minutes, turning half way through.
Place on two paper plates and coat with fudge. Enjoy.

instructionGroups.label: For the hot fudge
instructions: Place fudge cubes in small sauce pan and heat on low, stirring vigorously
Keep stirring until the potatoes are done

tips: Try not to eat all the fudge prior to preparing this dish
This is a really confusing dish for children and the elderly
They call it hot fudge for a reason. Be careful
